title: Bloodletting & Miraculous Cures: Stories
description: Twelve interwoven stories follow the lives of a group of young doctors--Fitz, Ming, Chen, and Sri--as they make their way from medical school to the world of emergency rooms, evacuation missions, and research into chilling new viruses, dealing with a host of challenges and moral dilemmas along the way. A first novel. Winner of the 2006 Giller Prize. 100,000 first printing.
author: Vincent Lam
